text: Where Is Coletti? () is a 1913 German silent comedy film directed by Max Mack and starring Hans Junkermann, Madge Lessing, and Heinrich Peer. It was a major commercial hit on its release. The film's sets were designed by Hermann Warm. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1913 films Category:German films Category:Films of the German Empire Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by Max Mack Category:1910s chase films Category:German black-and-white films Category:German comedy films Category:1913 comedy films
title: Where Is Coletti?
